name: test_scale_down
description:
Tests juju remove-unit functionality.

    This test verifies:
    1. multiple units can be removed while still maintaining a majority (ie remove a minority)
    2. Replica set hosts are properly updated on unit removal
descriptionHtml:
Tests juju remove-unit functionality.

This test verifies:
1. multiple units can be removed while still maintaining a majority (ie remove a minority)
2. Replica set hosts are properly updated on unit removal
